pages.text: In the world, there are special plants you can use for different purposes. We call them herbs or healing herbs. They often have a particular and distinctive scent, but they can also look so similar! Herbs will help in many ways, but others are so dangerous that you shall never even touch them.

Herbs can be found all around the world. You will find herbs in biomes such as forests and plains, they always grow in small patches every certain distance. You can't be sure you will always find exactly what you need, so make sure to learn where each of them grow! $(br2)Part of gathering herbs, is knowing how to properly do it. Be careful with them, make sure you don't tear them apart but carefully collect them instead. They will grow back, they always do.$(br)

pages.title: Herbs in the Wild
pages.text: Take a good look! This is how every herb usually looks.
Some plants grow alone, others in clusters, but they all are found in patches around the world. Learn to recognize their shape and colors, you will find more about it in each of every herb's entry!
